resources.string: Welcome to the Dead Reckoning Guidance Application for the visually impaired. Touch the top of the screen to connect to client. Touch the middle of the screen to connect to server. Touch the bottom of the screen for help.

Keep the phone as flat as possible. From the main screen, choose an option from the menu. Touch the top of the screen to connect to client. Touch the middle of the screen to act as the host. Touch the bottom of the screen for help. Touch the bottom of the current screen to return to the main menu.
